levelPack.packDescription: Dive deep with Marina the Mermaid and explore the amazing ocean!

levels.title: Meet the Ocean Friends
levels.miniStory: Marina wants to introduce you to her ocean friends! Can you match them?

puzzleData.instruction: Match each creature to what makes it special!

levels.hint: Think about how each animal moves or looks!
levels.funFact: Octopuses have three hearts!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ Welcome! Let's meet my ocean friends!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ Great job! You're learning fast!

levels.title: Coral Garden Path
levels.miniStory: Help Marina swim through the colorful coral garden!

puzzleData.instruction: Find the path through the corals!

levels.hint: Go around the coral in the middle!
levels.funFact: Corals are actually tiny animals, not plants!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ Let's swim through my garden!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ You're a natural swimmer!

levels.title: Ocean Colors
levels.miniStory: The ocean has so many beautiful colors! Can you arrange them?

puzzleData.instruction: Put the colors in order from water to fish!

levels.hint: Start with what you see most in the ocean!
levels.funFact: The ocean looks blue because water absorbs red light!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ Look at all these pretty colors!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ Beautiful! You have a good eye!

levels.title: Sea Creature Homes
levels.miniStory: Every sea creature has a special home. Can you match them?

puzzleData.instruction: Match each animal to where it lives!

levels.hint: Clownfish love to hide in anemones!
levels.funFact: Clownfish are protected by anemone's stinging tentacles!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ Let's find where everyone lives!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ Perfect! You know all the homes!

levels.title: Treasure Hunt Path
levels.miniStory: There's treasure hidden in the reef! Help Marina find it!

puzzleData.instruction: Navigate to the treasure chest!

levels.hint: Try going around the obstacles!
levels.funFact: Real treasure has been found in shipwrecks underwater!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ Let's find the hidden treasure!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ You found it! Amazing!

levels.title: Ocean Food Chain
levels.miniStory: In the ocean, everyone eats something! Can you put them in order?

puzzleData.instruction: Arrange from smallest to biggest eater!

levels.hint: Start with the tiniest creatures!
levels.funFact: Plankton are so small you need a microscope to see most of them!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ Let's learn who eats what!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ You understand the ocean food chain!

levels.title: Dolphin Pod
levels.miniStory: Dolphins travel in groups called pods! Match the dolphins!

puzzleData.instruction: Match the dolphin families!

levels.hint: Dolphins live in family groups!
levels.funFact: Dolphins have names for each other using special whistles!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¬ Hi! Help me find my pod!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¬ Thank you! My family is together!

levels.title: Kelp Forest Maze
levels.miniStory: The kelp forest is like an underwater jungle! Find your way through!

puzzleData.instruction: Navigate through the tall kelp!

levels.hint: Kelp grows very tall - swim around it!
levels.funFact: Kelp can grow up to 2 feet per day!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ The kelp forest is beautiful but tricky!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ You made it through! Great navigation!

levels.title: Ocean Layers
levels.miniStory: The ocean has different layers from top to bottom!

puzzleData.instruction: Arrange ocean zones from surface to deep!

levels.hint: Start where the sun shines brightest!
levels.funFact: Only 5% of the ocean has been explored by humans!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ Let's explore the ocean depths!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ You know the ocean layers perfectly!

levels.title: Sea Creature Sounds
levels.miniStory: Ocean animals make amazing sounds! Can you match them?

puzzleData.instruction: Match animals to their sounds!

levels.hint: Dolphins make clicking sounds!
levels.funFact: Whales can hear each other from 1000 miles away!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ Listen to the ocean symphony!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ You have great ears!

levels.title: Shipwreck Adventure
levels.miniStory: An old shipwreck lies on the ocean floor! Explore it carefully!

puzzleData.instruction: Navigate through the shipwreck!

levels.hint: Watch out for broken parts of the ship!
levels.funFact: There are over 3 million shipwrecks in the ocean!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¦€ Ahoy! Let's explore this old ship!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¦€ Arr! You're a brave explorer!

levels.title: Coral Types
levels.miniStory: There are many types of coral! Can you match them?

puzzleData.instruction: Match coral types to their shapes!

levels.hint: Brain coral really looks like a brain!
levels.funFact: Corals are animals, not plants!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¡ Let's study different corals!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¡ Excellent! You're a coral scientist!

levels.title: Whale Migration
levels.miniStory: Whales travel thousands of miles! Put their journey in order!

puzzleData.instruction: Arrange the whale migration journey!

levels.hint: Whales feed in cold waters first!
levels.funFact: Whales migrate up to 12,000 miles each year!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ Let's follow the whales!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ You understand whale migration!

levels.title: Deep Sea Challenge
levels.miniStory: The deep sea is dark and mysterious! Can you navigate it?

puzzleData.instruction: Find your way through the deep sea!

levels.hint: Take your time and plan your route!
levels.funFact: The deepest part of the ocean is 36,000 feet deep!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ The deep sea is challenging!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ Wow! You're fearless!

levels.title: Bioluminescent Creatures
levels.miniStory: Some deep sea creatures glow in the dark! Match them!

puzzleData.instruction: Match glowing creatures to their lights!

levels.hint: Many deep sea creatures make their own light!
levels.funFact: 90% of deep sea creatures can glow!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¡ Look at these glowing creatures!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¡ Amazing! You know bioluminescence!

levels.title: Octopus Intelligence
levels.miniStory: Octopuses are super smart! Match their amazing abilities!

puzzleData.instruction: Match octopus abilities!

levels.hint: Octopuses have 9 brains!
levels.funFact: Octopuses can taste with their arms!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¡ Octopuses are incredibly smart!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¡ You appreciate their intelligence!

levels.title: Ocean Conservation
levels.miniStory: We need to protect our oceans! Put these steps in order!

puzzleData.instruction: Arrange ocean protection steps!

levels.hint: Start by reducing plastic use!
levels.funFact: 8 million tons of plastic enter oceans yearly!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ Let's learn to protect our ocean!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ You're an ocean hero!

levels.title: Ultimate Ocean Maze
levels.miniStory: The ultimate challenge! Navigate through the complex reef!

puzzleData.instruction: Find the path through the ultimate maze!

levels.hint: Plan carefully and think ahead!
levels.funFact: Coral reefs cover less than 1% of the ocean but support 25% of marine life!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ This is the ultimate challenge!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ Incredible! You're a master!

levels.title: Ocean Ecosystem
levels.miniStory: Everything in the ocean is connected! Match the relationships!

puzzleData.instruction: Match each creature to its role!

levels.hint: Every creature has an important job!
levels.funFact: Plankton produce 50% of Earth's oxygen!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ¡ Let's understand the ecosystem!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ¡ Perfect! You're an expert!

levels.title: Ocean Master Challenge
levels.miniStory: You've learned so much! Time for the final master challenge!

puzzleData.instruction: Arrange the complete ocean journey!

levels.hint: Start at the surface and go deeper!
levels.funFact: You're now an Ocean Master! The ocean is 71% of Earth's surface!

characterDialogue.intro: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ Final challenge! Show me everything you've learned!
characterDialogue.success: ğŸ§œâ€â™€ï¸ INCREDIBLE! You're an Ocean Master! ğŸ†
